casebody.data:
Mary A. RILEY, Administratrix of the Estate of Frank L. Riley, deceased, Plaintiff-Appellant, v. SOUTHERN TRANSP. CO., Defendant-Appellee. No. 76, Docket 22135. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued Nov. 8, 1951. Decided Nov. 21, 1951. Solomon Goodman, New York City, for appellant. Nelson, Healy, Baillie & Burke, New •York City, Allen A. Baillie, New York City, of counsel, for appellee.

Before SWAN, Chief Judge, FRANK, Circuit Judge and COXE, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed as to the first cause of action on the opinion below, D.C., 90 F.Supp. 842. The second cause of action has been discontinued by stipulation.
